text: Mustafa Wahab, also known as Mamo ka Bano or Lotta, is a Pakistani politician who served as 3rd Mayor of Dera Ghazi Khan from 2013 to 2018, and also serving as an MPA of Punjab Assembly since 2002. He is elected MPA for 5th time elect in every election since 2002 ==References==
title: Mustafa Wahab
